title: PubMatic to Participate in Upcoming Financial Conferences - PubMatic (NASDAQ:PUBM)
description: NO-HEADQUARTERS/REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Aug. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PubMatic, Inc. (NASDAQ:PUBM), an independent technology company delivering digital advertising's supply chain of the future, today announced that
content:
NO-HEADQUARTERS/REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Aug. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PubMatic, Inc. PUBM, an independent technology company delivering digital advertising's supply chain of the future, today announced that members of its management team are scheduled to participate at the following upcoming financial conferences:
• Oppenheimer's 28th Annual Technology, Internet & Communications Conference on Wednesday, August 13, 2025. Management will participate in a virtual webcasted fire-side chat at 11:35 a.m. ET / 8:35 a.m. PT
• Rosenblatt 5th Annual Virtual Technology Summit on Tuesday, August 19, 2025. Management will participate in a virtual webcasted fire-side chat at 3:00 p.m. ET / 12:00 p.m. PT
• Management will host 1x1 meetings at the Wolfe TMT Conference in San Francisco on September 10, 2025.



Live webcasts will be available in the "Events" section of PubMatic's investor relations website at https://investors.pubmatic.com/news-events/investor-calendar. The webcast replay will be available following the conclusion of the live presentations for 90 days.

PubMatic PUBM is an independent technology company maximizing customer value by delivering digital advertising's supply chain of the future. PubMatic's sell-side platform empowers the world's leading digital content creators across the open internet to control access to their inventory and increase monetization by enabling marketers to drive return on investment and reach addressable audiences across ad formats and devices. Since 2006, our infrastructure-driven approach has allowed for the efficient processing and utilization of data in real time. By delivering scalable and flexible programmatic innovation, we improve outcomes for our customers while championing a vibrant and transparent digital advertising supply chain.
summary: PubMatic, an independent technology company delivering digital advertising's supply chain, is set to participate in several upcoming financial conferences. The company will participate at Oppenheimer's 28th Annual Technology, Internet & Communications Conference on August 13, 2025, followed by the Rosenblatt 5th Annual Virtual Technology Summit on August 19, 2025. Management will host 1x1 meetings at the Wolfe TMT Conference in San Francisco on September 10, 2025 and live webcasts will be available on PubMatic's investor relations website.
shortSummary: PubMatic's management will participate in upcoming financial conferences, including Oppenheimer's 28th Annual Technology, Internet, and Social Media Conference, promoting PubMatic' innovative digital advertising platform strategy.
argos_summary: PubMatic, Inc. announced that its management team will participate in several upcoming financial conferences, including Oppenheimer's Technology, Internet & Communications Conference and Rosenblatt's Virtual Technology Summit, both featuring virtual fire-side chats. Additionally, they will host one-on-one meetings at the Wolfe TMT Conference in San Francisco. The events will be accessible via live webcasts on PubMatic's investor relations website, with replays available for 90 days.
